awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Comedy-drama about a Sicilian woman (Vitti), "dishonored" by her lover, goes to England with a pistol intending to murder him.
plot: Comedy-drama about a Sicilian woman (Vitti), "dishonored" by her lover, goes to England with a pistol intending to murder him.
title: The Girl with a Pistol
